comments.creator: dwayne@translate.org.za
comments.author: dwayne@translate.org.za
comments.text:
browser/chrome/browser/browser.dtd historyButton.label and historySidebarCmd.accesskey do not match.  The names should be the same to allow translators and tools to associate the label to the accesskey

Please change historySidebarCmd to align with historyButton
comments.raw_text:
browser/chrome/browser/browser.dtd historyButton.label and historySidebarCmd.accesskey do not match.  The names should be the same to allow translators and tools to associate the label to the accesskey

Please change historySidebarCmd to align with historyButton
